author: jameshe5018
content: I wanted to ask client teams' thoughts are around chunking requests for the prepare beacon proposer API and the validator registration APIs. Also thoughts on deadlines for the requests. I think lodestar is chunking at 512 items per request ( not sure about the deadline ) and teku chunking validator registration at 100 per request. Someone also mentioned that builder API has an 8 second deadline ( wondering if anyone can confirm this)

author: jgm
content: As in: the number of entries sent to a beacon node in a single request?  I don't see any benefit of pushing complexity to API users in that way, compared to the beacon nodes chunking them internally if they so desire.
